title: about2
description: PET plastic can only be mechanically recycled six time before losing their initial value and purity Enzymes can recycle PET plastic infinitely many times

title: about2
description: Impurities contaminate the mechanically recycled PET plastic making it impossible to recycle Enzymes ignore impurities and only produce valuable end-products

title: about2
description: Enzyme promiscuity holds the promise of degrading other types of plastics, not just PET
